name: PUA_exemple
controlSchema: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema","type":"object","additionalProperties":false,"required":["DescriptionLevel","Title"],"definitions":{"pattern-simple-date":{"pattern":"[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}","type":"string"},"pattern-date":{"pattern":"^([0-8][0-9]{3}-(0[1-9]|1[0-2])-(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01]))$","type":"string"}},"properties":{"ArchiveUnitProfile":{"description":"Identifiant du PUA : cardinalité 1","type":"string"},"#management":{"properties":{"AppraisalRule":{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"object","properties":{"Rules":{"items":{"properties":{"StartDate":{"type":"string"},"Rule":{"type":"string"}},"required":["Rule","StartDate"]}},"FinalAction":{"enums":["RestrictAccess","Transfer","Copy"],"type":"string"}},"required":["FinalAction"]}}},"DescriptionLevel":{"description":"Niveau de description : cardinalité 1","type":"string","enum":["Fonds","Collection"]},"Title":{"pattern":"[0-9]{4}","type":"object"},"Writer":{"additionalProperties":true,"type":"array","required":["FullName","Function"],"properties":{"Function":{"type":"array"},"FullName":{"type":"string"}}},"CreatedDate":{"pattern":"[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}T[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}:[0-9]{2}","type":"string"},"Gps":{"additionalProperties":false,"type":"object"}}}
